Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Shelley M Turner
Reviews.Content: Ive had this camera for 2 years with no problems.  I keep it in my purse so that it is always with me.  I know that the video has no sound, but its a camera.  It takes great pictures and I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: No sound is a bummer!
Reviews.Author: Web Lady "Web Lady"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in a rush b/c I needed something for an impromptu trip. The pictures came out beautiful. I didn't know when I bought it that it didn't have sound on the video. (Not sure what Nikon's logic is for that). Had I known, I would have purchased something else. I do not recommend this camera b/c there are plenty of other good cameras out there in the same price range with sound. I paid $125 at Target and I think this model may only be available at Target. Look around, you can definitely find something better

Reviews.Title: Had this AWESOME camera for over 3 years....but
Reviews.Author: W. Melvin "Okie Mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Disneyland in early 2009. It has been used heavily. It took awesome pics, I would carry it a lot of times instead of my Canon DSLR. I was disappointed that there was no sound for the video but please...for 120.00? AWESOME CAMERA! I suddenly got a lens error with an exclaimation point and I tried cleaning the lens and blowing it with air but it won't work :( I am pretty upset because I think it finally bit the "dust" I would still buy this exact camera again today I LOVED IT!

Reviews.Title: WARNING:  DO NOT BUY!!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Waller "Mike"
Reviews.Content: We have 2 of these cameras (my wife and son got them for Christmas at the same time)they have both died with exactly the same problem...."LENS ERROR".... if you are considering this camera, do yourself a favor and search Nikon lens error and see what I mean. What a piece of junk!!!! Nikon does not warranty this fault. They call it a "usage error".

Reviews.Title: perfect camera
Reviews.Author: D. Ort "BoardingDo"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as apresent for my 13th birth day. It is a very good camera with quality pictures.It's very light, not sophisticated to deal with it might be missing some things like not being able to edit videos on it... But all in all it's a great camera

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures/Horrible Videos
Reviews.Author: Chill
Reviews.Content: Chose this camara for small size and large display.  Takes beautiful pictures.  Just caught my daughter doing something cure on the video and found (after hours scouring the manual & online) that there is no audio.  I also wish I had found this out sooner and could have returned it.  My mistake for making the assumption that  - if it records videos and has an AV/Adaptor - it will have sound.

Reviews.Title: Broke after 2 months - AVOID
Reviews.Author: R. Hunt
Reviews.Content: We had this camera for 2 months before it gave a "lens error" message that will not go away.  It will not take pictures, and the lens will not retract or move.  It whirs and clicks and moves a little, but then stops and gives the error message.  It was never dropped, jostled, or abused in any way.  Naturally, this problem is not covered under warranty, and to repair it will almost as much as it cost to purchase.I did an internet search of this problem, and it seems to be VERY common with this camera and with other Nikon cameras.  I will not buy another Nikon again.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Kevin M
Reviews.Content: I got my Coolpix S202 last Christmas as a gift.  So far it has been a great camera.  Takes really great pictures and fairly easy to use.  I have just a few issues though.  First I wish there was a better battery meter.  The camera does not warn that the battery is low until you are down to the last dozen pics.  A battery level gauge would be nice.  Also it would be nice to be able to recharge the battery via USB cable for times when a 120 volt outlet is not available or for times when I don't want to carry (or forget) the AC charger.  Other than these two issues a very good entry-level digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Still working hard ...
Reviews.Author: BobbieK
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as something light to carry in my pocket so that I can always have it on hand for photos. I was aware that it did not have sound when I bought it, so I wasn't disappointed, although I would choose a different one today.This has bounced around in my purse and taken countless photos, but is still working. The worst thing that happened was that I lost the charger and had to buy a new one.I had been taking my quick photos recently with my iPhone, but needed some clearer photos, so I grabbed this out of the closet, and it continues to work away.Technology is outdated, but camera is still nice.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: P. Martinez "Peter"
Reviews.Content: This camera cost me $100 at Target. The pictures it takes aren't bad, but if you use the flash the pictures will make objects/people look a little white because of the reflection. I bought this camera to record videos and take some quick pictures but turns out that the videos it records DON'T!!! have sound. This camera records videos without audio, I don't see the logic in that. You can find a better camera for the same price or lower. The box/description doesn't sat anything about the camera not having sound in videos, you are better off using your phone camera.

Reviews.Title: be warned - cannot record sound with video
Reviews.Author: J. Hogan
Reviews.Content: delightful little camera, takes great pictures,but we are returning it....why?, because it does not record sound with the videos.Videos are otherwise very good (30fps) but NO sound. For usthat's a show stopper, so back it goes....This is not something you'll find prominently on the outside of the box either. You have to go to page 55 in the manual before you find that out.

Reviews.Title: Lens error issues
Reviews.Author: honest abe
Reviews.Content: We have had this camera for a year. Picture quality was sub-par, but we liked the portability and price so we stuck with it. Recently had a "lens error" message which made the camera unusable. After checking for solutions, found many people have the same problem. I would not purchase this camera if I had to do it over again.

Reviews.Title: Great little low cost digital camera
Reviews.Author: Peter P. Sadlon "Peter Sadlon"
Reviews.Content: Admitted it is an inadequate video recorder but not every one wants or need one of them. I needed/wanted something that took decent pictures at an affordable price and it seems to have fit the bill for that better than I expected.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT SOUND FOR MOVIES
Reviews.Author: Catherine M. Powell "felinedoctor"
Reviews.Content: I am so incredibly frustrated that this camera does not have sound with the movies/videos.  I bought this camera before Christmas and did not need to take any videos until Christmas morning.  It was not until that time that I realized the movies do not record sound!  NOWHERE on the box or in the manual does it state that and I am SO MAD AT NIKON!  I had to CALL the customer service representative to be told that this camera does not record sound!  DON"T BUY THIS CAMERA!!!  ANd you can bet that I will not buy another Nikon product.  I consider it to be false advertising to a degree.  I even did research on this camera beforehand and did not come across this information.  UGH!

Reviews.Title: If you take videos DONT BUY THIS CAMERA!!!
Reviews.Author: V. Lagares
Reviews.Content: Well I bought this camera a week before christmas for myself. I was planning on making afew videos as well. Theres a speaker and a mic on the camera but finally after weeks of playing with it and trying to upload videos on new pc's I contacted the company and was informed that yes they have a mic and speaker on the camera but they dont work! What bs! I wish I would have done this sooner so that I could have returned it!

ProductInfo.Features:
Point + Shoot Digital Camera Compatible with Secure Digital Memory Card, Secure Digital High Capacity Card
Includes Digital Camera, Battery Charger
3x Optical Zoom for Snapshots and Vacation Photos; 4x Digital Zoom for Minor Cropping
Shooting Modes: Macro, Continuous Shooting (Burst), Movie, Automatic Shooting Mode; 52 MB Memory Storage Capacity
Image Editing: In-Camera Cropping, Image Resizing, Date Time Imprinting, Cyanotype; Movie Modes: Playback, AVI Movie without Sound
Flash Modes: Off Flash, Autoflash, Slow-Sync Flash Improves Night Photos, Fill-In Flash, Auto with Red-Eye Reduction
Black-and-White, Sepia, Auto, Standard, Vivid, Panorama Photo Effects
File Format Compatibility: AVI File Format, PC and Mac, PictBridge, JPEG File Format
White Balance: Fluorescent, Daylight, Automatic, Shade, Incandescent for Adjusting Light
Additional Features: Powerful and Ultra-Compact, Lightweight, A/V Output
Also Includes USB Cable, Battery Charger, Wrist Strap, Photo Editing Software, Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery, Manual, Warranty Card
Required (Not Included): SD Card
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix S202 Digital Camera (Silver)
